name: ANSI Splatterhouse
description:
1 level demo prototype:

shift - jump

control - attack

control + shift + down right as you land going full speed - Slide attack.

This was a project that I actually left in good condition, probably the best readable code out of any other game I've made, so jumping back into it shouldn't be an issue. I do hope to extend it at some point if I ever get free time!
